Plot: Jacquetta, daughter of the Count of Luxembourg and kinswoman to half the royalty of Europe, was married to the great Englishman John, Duke of Bedford, uncle to Henry VI. Widowed at the age of 19, she took the extraordinary risk of marrying a gentleman of her household for love, and then carved out a new life for herself.
Characters: Elizabeth Woodville, Henry VI of England, Edward IV of England, Margaret of Anjou, Edward of Westminster, Prince of Wales, Jacquetta Woodville, Anthony Woodville, 2nd Earl Rivers, Richard Woodville, 1st Earl Rivers, John of Lancaster, 1st Duke of Bedford, Joan of Arc
